capabilities.name: Software-Defined Perimeter (ZTNA)
capabilities.description: Conceals network resources and grants adaptive access based on identity and context (Zero Trust Network Access).

capabilities.name: Dynamic Posture Management
capabilities.description: Automatically adjusts user/device access privileges based on real-time device security posture and user context.

capabilities.name: Threat Intelligence Integration
capabilities.description: Incorporates external threat intelligence feeds to update access policies (e.g., blocking known malicious IPs or indicators).

capabilities.name: Comprehensive Audit Logging
capabilities.description: Provides detailed audit logs of user access and policy decisions for compliance reporting and SIEM analysis.

operating_context.user_types: Employees, Contractors (state agencies and external partners)

maturity.model: Internal 1-5 scale aligned with cybersecurity maturity benchmarks

AI_recommendations.recommendation: Conduct specialized training for administrators on AppGate SDP and zero trust policies
AI_recommendations.trigger: IT staff is unfamiliar with the new SDP technology

AI_recommendations.recommendation: Enable and configure device posture check features for all users
AI_recommendations.trigger: Many users connect with BYOD devices, posing varying security postures

AI_recommendations.recommendation: Integrate AppGate SDP with threat intelligence feeds and SIEM
AI_recommendations.trigger: High volume of emerging threats targeting government networks
